main.name: Eco, Mystical Spirit of the Forest

notes.text:
Behold, a deck that synergizes the Bamboo engine with Type Zero Magic Crusher to burn from any scenario.
-Eco was mainly for Bamboo Sprite if I started second. Cursed Bamboo's bounce effect also lets him hit directly for 1700 if convenient.
-3 Iron Blacksmith Kotatsu to search out Cursed Bamboo Sword or even Sword of Deep-Seated to avoid topdecking it.
-2 Lava Golem with Ante are anti-swarm + more burn.
-1 Magical Mallet to circumvent some ded hands.
-Sword of Deep-Seated can be a quick 1k burn on opponent's End Phase (since you draw the sword again), and enables Jars of Avarice if you happen to empty your deck.
-2 Rainbow Life to deny/heal damage over one whole turn.
-2 Jars of Avarice to recycle Bamboo first and other cards second.
-Curse of Anubis as a general defense in a rampant effect monster meta.
-Type Zero Magic Crusher is your main form of attack. Spend Cursed Bamboo, search Golden. Spend Deep-Seated, avoid decking out. Spend other spells if you think you have lethal.
